name: phone
title: Phone Call
description: Make phone and facetime calls with raycast.
author: alexkim5682

commands.name: phone
commands.title: Call
commands.description: Intiates a phone call with a contact or a given phone number.

commands.name: facetime
commands.title: Facetime Call
commands.description: Intiates a facetime call with a contact.

preferences.name: no_confirmation
preferences.title: Remove Confirmation Dialog
preferences.description: Removes the confirmation dialog when facetiming.
preferences.label: Enable

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
